image.title: Kolkata News, Latest Kolkata News, Kolkata News Today and Headlines | Hindustan Times

item.title: Bengal’s ‘one-rupee doctor’ clinic reopens months after his demise
item.description: In 2020, the doctor was conferred with the Padma Shri by the central government for his contribution to society. He was also mentioned in the Guinness World Records in 2020 for treating the maximum number of patients in his career as a doctor

item.title: West Bengal governor CV Ananda Bose’s principal secretary relieved of her duties
item.description: Nandini Chakravorty was appointed as principal secretary to governor La Ganesan in August 2022 and she continued in that post after Bose took oath, replacing Ganesan, in November last year

item.title: Ruckus in Bengal assembly after Suvendu's speech; Mamata Banerjee slams BJP
item.description: Speaking in the state assembly, Mamata Banerjee said the country should strive to bring in a “people's government to end anarchy”.
